"Terms of Service

We know it’s boring and its something no one wants to look at, but it’s important what you can expect from us and what we can expect from you as you use our services.

Thank you for choosing Zerostic.

This is a license agreement between you and Zerostic. This agreement describes your rights and the conditions upon which you may use Zerostic software’s and services. You should review the entire agreement, including any supplemental license terms that accompany the software and any linked terms, because all the terms are important and together create this agreement that applies to you.

By accepting this agreement or using our software or service, you agree to all these terms, and consent to the transmission of certain information during account creation and during your use of the software or services. If you do not accept and comply with these terms, you may not use the software or its features.

1) Installation and Use Rights

The software is licensed, not sold. Under this agreement, we grant you the right to install and run one instance of the software on your device, for use by one person at a time, so long as you comply with all the terms of this agreement. Updating or upgrading from non-genuine software with software from Zerostic or authorized sources does not make your original version or the updated/upgraded version genuine, and in that situation, you do not have a license to use the software.

2) Privacy Consent and Use of Data

Your privacy is important to us. Some of the software features send or receive information when using those features. Many of these features can be switched off in the user interface, or you can choose not to use them. By accepting this agreement and using the software you agree that Zerostic may collect and use the information as described in the Zerostic privacy policy, and as may be described in the user interface associated with the software features.

3) Network and Internet Usage

Some features of the software and services accessed through the software may require your device to access the Internet. Your access and usage (including charges) may be subject to the terms of your cellular or internet provider agreement.

Just few more things

Zerostic has the right to update its terms of service and privacy policy in future if Zerostic updates its ToS or Privacy Policy it will inform you in advance and its upon you whether you want to continue using our software’s or services. Zerostic can delete your data or information as well as your account stored in our systems if you do not accept our terms in future, without accepting the terms of service or privacy policy use of any software’s or service provided by Zerostic will be considered illegal.

"

"Privacy Policy

When you use our software’s and services, we collect some information from you to provide you the best of features we can. This is a big responsibility and we do understand this, also we do our best to protect your information, because we at Zerostic believe that your privacy matters.

Information that we collect.

We collect information based on the software or service you use. All your information is saved on our server except some of your confidential information such as account details. Zerostic never stores your account details.

You may access some of our services by signing up for a Zerostic Account and providing us with some personal information (typically your name, email address, and a password). This account information is used to authenticate you when you access Zerostic services and protect your account from unauthorized access by others. You can edit or delete your account at any time by contacting us.

Information that we share.

Information that we share depends on the software and services you are using keeping in mind that your data is safe. Zerostic may share required/relevant information about you with advertisers, business partners, sponsors, and other third parties. However, we only divulge aggregate information about our users and will not share personally identifiable information with any third party without your express consent.

We reserve the right at our discretion to make changes to this policy at any time. Please check this page periodically for changes.

"

"Refund Policy

Zerostic Refund Policy

Some content made available on the application can be availed only by registered Users who have registered under a subscription model (Paid User). You may need to register yourself on the website in future to avail these services on a subscription model (Subscription).

To become a Paid User, you may be required to provide certain personal information to Zerostic and may be required to make payments ("Subscription Fee") as per the applicable membership plan through a debit card, credit card, internet banking or through, e- prepaid wallet or other payment method accepted by Zerostic ("Payment Method(s)") that You opted for during registration. Zerostic will be using third party payment gateways to process and facilitate the payment of your Subscription Fee to Zerostic. On successful registration to the Subscription, Zerostic will notify you of the same. Zerostic may offer different kinds of Subscription plans, each of these subscription plans will be subject to different limitations and restrictions and the cost of each of these subscription plans may vary.

Zerostic shall have the discretion to make certain content that is a part of the subscription available to you on more than one end user compatible system concurrently.

Free Trial

Some of the Subscription plans may start with a free trial. The free trial period may last for a period of one month or such other term as may be determined by Zerostic. Your eligibility for a free trial including the time for such free trial and the Content available to be viewed during free trial period is at the discretion of Zerostic and such free trial can be modified, suspended, or terminated by Zerostic at any point of time. In case your existing plan has expired Zerostic will automatically start your Free Plan which consists of limited features in the software. During the Free Plan (not to be confused with FREE TRIAL) you must watch one ad per day which will allow you to use the application with the limitations. In case you opt not to watch the ad then automatically all the features will stop working and you will not be able to use the application, but the basic features (as decided by Zerostic) will be still working. During the Free Plan, ads do not add up, so if you do not want to use the application any day you do not need to watch the ad either. It is up to you if you want to upgrade from a Free Plan to a subscription.

Subscription

By providing your selected Payment Method, you authorize Zerostic (through its third-party payment gateway) to charge the applicable card or method for the Fee and you represent and warrant that you are the cardholder or account holder. In respect of a Subscription plan, you authorize Zerostic (through its third-party payment gateway) to charge your selected Payment Method for the Fees associated with your Subscription plan for monthly basis (for monthly plans) or yearly basis (for yearly plans) unless you provide notice that you no longer wish to receive the Subscription plan, or the Subscription plan is terminated in accordance with the Terms of Zerostic. If Payment Method is rejected by your card issuer or account provider, Zerostic will have no obligation to fulfil your order. Zerostic will automatically start billing as per Your selected Payment Method for the Subscription plan elected by You at the time of registration through the third-party payment gateway at the end of the free trial period, if applicable unless you cancel the Subscription before the end of the free trial period. The cancellation of the Subscription can be done through the "Payment" section in the settings of the application. It may take a few days for your payment made to Zerostic to be reflected in your "Profile" section. Zerostic offers two plans for INDIA and other countries they are:

INDIA (The amount will be charged in INR)

1st Plan includes services for 30 days that is the monthly subscription which starts from the day of the payment confirmation from the third-party payment gateways.

2nd Plan includes services for 365 days that is the yearly subscription which starts from the day of the payment confirmation from the third-party payment gateways.

Other Countries (The amount will be charged in USD)

1st Plan includes services for 90 days that is the Quarterly subscription which starts from the day of the payment confirmation from the third-party payment gateways.

2nd Plan includes services for 365 days that is the yearly subscription which starts from the day of the payment confirmation from the third-party payment gateways.

Any of the Plans stated above (including plans for INDIA and other countries) cannot be cancelled after its activation. Zerostic will never activate any of the plans without your confirmation even if you have opted for recurring subscription.

The Subscription Fees billed are non-refundable irrespective of whether the Subscription have been availed by you or not. Any changes in the Subscription Plan opted by you is effective only after the expiry of the current subscription period for which you have already been billed. No amount will be refunded in any case, but you can contact Zerostic though. Zerostic has the right to change its refund policy in future.

"
Hey, you are on a free plan and you need to watch one ad per day, watch this short ad and enjoy your one day of Good Morning for free.
How do you want to turn it off?
Why I need to Sign In?
We need to know users payment status to provide you more of Zerostic. That\'s why we require you to sign in. But don\'t worry your data is safe with us.

We want to provide more features but unfortunately it\'s not possible under Free Plan as we also have to pay our expenses so for users in Free Plan we ask them to watch one ad per day so that it benefits both of us.
You can contact us at our email ID support@zerostic.com and we are working on more areas where you can contact Zerostic.
Why should I turn off bluetooth after scheduling the alarm?
We recommend you to turn of bluetooth so that no audio device can get connected to your mobile until we fire the alarm.
Hey, we found that you have not provided us some basic information. Please select on how you signed in and provide us with these details as it is required for the application to function properly.
Hey, your default settings are missing. Please set it from the button below.
A new version of Good Morning is available. Please update to enjoy the latest features.
Good Morning needs notification permission to send you alarm notifications. Please enable it.
